name: iii Demake
description:
iii is a little "catroidvania" about a one-eyed cat leaving his comfort zone. Explore underground caverns, gain vision of other dimensions, help the inhabitants, and expand your horizons. iii was originally made by Yukon W. for Ludum Dare 38. This is a PICO-8 Demake made with his permission :)

Left/Right - Move
Z/C - Jump
Up - Interact
Down - Swap Dimensions

Play the original game here: https://yukonw.itch.io/iii

Enjoy!
